NOT SMELLY MOUNTAIN.}} '''Worthless Idiot''' is an [imp](/imp/) and a recruitable [crew member](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireCrewMembers/) in {{poe2}}. ## Background An imp thrown out of [Arkemyr](/arkemyr/)'s mansion for spraying excrement over his owner's tablet. He has since taken to watching the ships come and go from his observation point in the [Watershapers Guild](/watershapersGuild/) garden, salivating at the seagulls landing on the ships' riggings. Recruiting him is as simple as asking him if he wants to "set sail and eat gulls", and explaining how often you beat your crew. Allowing him to join your crew will cause the disgust of a few citizens of Neketaka, so look forward to being berated from then on. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = |none = |other = |crew = * {{crewrank|1|navigator}} * Personality: Greedy, Primordial * {{cp2|0}} to hire }} ## Trivia * Despite his name, Worthless Idiot actually has a relatively high [Intellect](/intellect/), certainly higher than most of the general population and just two points below that of archmage [Arkemyr](/arkemyr/), his previous master. ## Gallery Portrait_Worthless_Idiot_sm.png | Worthless Idiot's crew portrait [Category:Neketaka crew recruits](/categoryNeketakaCrewRecruits/)[Category:Periki's Overlook characters](/categoryPerikisOverlookCharacters/)[Category:Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire crew members](/categoryPillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireCrewMembers/)
